
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(spdk-lib-env_dpdk)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-env_dpdk PRIVATE
  -DALLOW_EXPERIMENTAL_API
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-env_dpdk PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-env_dpdk PUBLIC
  drivers-bus-pci
  drivers-mempool-ring
  dpdk-lib-librte_eal
  dpdk-lib-librte_mempool
  spdk-lib-log
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-env_dpdk PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/env.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/init.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/memory.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/pci.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/pci_event.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/threads.c
)

add_global_library_for(spdk-lib-env_dpdk.global spdk-lib-env_dpdk)
target_compile_options(spdk-lib-env_dpdk.global PRIVATE
  -DALLOW_EXPERIMENTAL_API
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(spdk-lib-env_dpdk.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/include
)
target_link_libraries(spdk-lib-env_dpdk.global PUBLIC
  drivers-bus-pci
  drivers-mempool-ring
  dpdk-lib-librte_eal
  dpdk-lib-librte_mempool
  spdk-lib-log
)
target_sources(spdk-lib-env_dpdk.global PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/pci_idxd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/pci_ioat.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/pci_virtio.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/pci_vmd.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/spdk/lib/env_dpdk/sigbus_handler.c
)
